scripts.say: After eliminating the imposter spawned by the Mirror Sea, all the members of Hololive and Azur Lane safely managed to regroup.
They brought with them the supplies they had gathered to the Resistance hideout, and spent the rest of their day there.
Inside the Hololive Resistance Base
So when you defeated the Aqua clone, she instantly turned to light and vanished?
Hang on... Doesn't that sound like she used the teleport command we have on the server?
Oh, you're kidding... You mean Tessy's assumed direct control of the server?
Tessy? Ah, that girl who looked like Tester...
Yeah. She's behaving really weird, just like Purifier. But unlike her, Tester is still evil...
That means there's a high chance that Tester is that alleged "ruler of time and space"... Oh, right, how are you Hololivers doing? Everything all right?
We're A-OK! Ayame and Shion didn't seem keen on fighting at first, but they're pretty eager now that they've gotten the hang of it!
Th-they're the enemy, Matsuri! Of course Ay will fight them with all Ay have!
Y-you said it! Aqua's enjoying herself too, so what's the big deal?
Ah, classic Gammadion Gang. Like three peas in a pod.
About the Sirens... Do you fight them all the time in this world?
Correct. They are our enemies and threaten the safety of our sea lanes.
We were created for the purpose of fighting the Sirens and driving them back.
Although I have another duty: to protect Nagato, the shrine maiden of the Sakura Empire.
Sorry. I didn't intend to make the conversation so serious.
Anyway, I suspect the Sirens will extract the data from your riggings to create more of their pawns. Your riggings were made here, after all.
You should expect to have to fight more enemies that look like one of your own.
Ahahahah, all we need to do is smack 'em down and put an end to whatever scheme the Sirens are trying to pull!
Then we'll find Tester– sorry, Tessy, and solve the mystery behind the Hololive Server. Then we'll get you Hololivers home!
But that's for tomorrow! Right now, we need to all get some sleep.
